R

register(Patron) - Method in class com.github.krlgit.lms.Library
Adds the specified Patron to this library if he is not already registered.
register(BookDescription) - Method in class com.github.krlgit.lms.Library
Adds a Book with the specified BookDescription to this library if a Book with the same Isbn is not already registered.
registerAdditionalCopy(String) - Method in class com.github.krlgit.lms.Library
String adapter for convenience; see Library.registerAdditionalCopyOf(Isbn) for documentation
registerAdditionalCopyOf(Isbn) - Method in class com.github.krlgit.lms.Library
Add another Copy of a Book that is already registered with the library.
requestRegisteredBook(String, String) - Method in class com.github.krlgit.lms.Library
String adapter for convenience; see Library.requestUnregisteredBook(Username, Isbn) for documentation
REQUESTS_FOR_AQUISITION - Static variable in class com.github.krlgit.lms.Library
The number of requests needed (5), till a new Book gets added to the Libraries shopping list.
REQUESTS_FOR_RESTOCKING - Static variable in class com.github.krlgit.lms.Library
The number of requests needed (2), till a Book that had previously existing copies in the system gets added to the Libraries shopping list.
requestUnregisteredBook(Username, Isbn) - Method in class com.github.krlgit.lms.Library

returnBook(Barcode) - Method in class com.github.krlgit.lms.Library
"Returns" borrowed Book with specified Barcode to Library (isCirculating=false), or removes it from the system, when Library.TIMES_BORROWED_BEFORE_REMOVAL was reached.
returnBook(String) - Method in class com.github.krlgit.lms.Library
String adapter for convenience; see Library.returnBook(Barcode) for documentation
